attributes.action: I would like the uk government to take more action on the coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
I feel like the world is locking down and the uk government is only advising washing your hands and self ISOLATE if you have cold and flu symptoms.
We need to do more now to try saving lives from being lost.
attributes.background: I want the uk government to do more now rather than later we need to lock down now to save many more lives. Close school and all public gatherings.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
